yodhayan kiwama apata mawenne wishala sharirayak athi pudgalayeki.eheth ohuta ewani sharirayak natha.enamudu ohu yodhayeki.surakimu dumriya pitupasa sitina ayomaya shakthiya ohu ya.ithama keti kalayak thula nikasala sankalpaya rata thulama wyaptha kirimata ohu kala meheya suwishesha wiya.ee sandaha wishishta sahayak dumriya departhamenthuwen da labuni.ohu wata siti sesu sagayo da eyata diwa ra sahaya laba dunha.dahas gananak wu surakimu shri lanka samajikayin da eyata sahaya wuha.dumriya magi sangam dun sahaya wachanayata nagiya nohaki tharam agane ya.ee siyalu denatama hisa nama aachara karami.

shri lanka krikat winisuru sangamayata anubaddha yapanaya disthrik krikat winisuru sangamaya, shri lanka krikat winisuru sangamaye dakunu palath(galla, mathara, hambanthota), madhyama palath(mahanuwara, mathale, nuwaraeliya), basnahira palath(kolambaa, kaluthara, gampaha), wayambaa palath(kurunagala, halawatha, puththalama) uthuru mada palath(anuradhapura, polonnaruwa), sabaragamuwa palatha saha nagenahira palatha washayen ekama pawulak lesa katayuthu karana sangamaye samajikayange kapawima saha dhairyaya itha ihalin agaya kala yuthu we.

wismayata pathwima gana kiyanawanam....eeka jiwithayata awashyama deyak...eeth api api ada koyitharam nam yanthrika welada kiyanawanam jiwithaya samanya deyak bawata pathwela.....apita jiwath wenna krama dekak thiyenawa...ekko jiwithya purawat wismayata pathwena dewal soyanna...ehema nathnam...me thiyena jiwithe gana wismayata path wima.....

jathyanthara prashnawaladi apa gaman karanne ekama margayaka yayi mamadiyarow mahatha janadhipathi rajapaksha mahathata pawasiya.shri lankawe anewasika asarbayijana thanapathi eebrarahim hajiyew, widesha amathi mahacharya ji.el. piris, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga yana mahathwaru saha widesha amathyanshaye wadabalana lekam shenuka senewirathna mahathmiya sakachchawata ekwa sitiyaha..

me siyallata hethuwa yuropa parlimenthuwa wisin shri lankawata ji es pi plas sahanaya laba diya yuthuda nadda yanna pilibanda wiwadayak pawathwa chanda wimasimak sidu kirimata niyamithawu bawini. 2017 aprel 27 brahaspathinda yuropa parlimenthuwe pawathi chanda wimasimedi shri lankawata ji es pi plas sahanaya laba diya yuthu nathayi yanuwen idiripath karana lada yojanawata wipakshawa chanda 436kda, pakshawa chanda 119k da labi wadi chanda 325kin parajaya wiya.

“oba siyaludena ma langata aawe mata upakara karannada?+ aththatama oba aawe mata udaw karanna nam oba ma gana thabu wishwasaya mama kada karanne naha.+ namuth kisi waradak nokala mawa+ mage sathuran athata pawa denna oba aawa nam ape muthunmiththange dewi eeta nisi piyawara ganiyi.”+ 18 ewita pamina siti ee thisdenage pradhaniya wu amasayi thula dewige balaya+ kriyathmaka wi ohu mese kiweya.“dawith, api oba samangayi.+ yessege puthraya, api sahayogaya denne obatayi.obata samadanaya labewa!

janadhipathiwaraya ghathana kumanthranayata ‘ro’ sanwidhanaya (indiya rajaye paryeshana ha wishleshana eekakaya) sambandha bawata chodana kala bawa siya pradhana puwathak lesa wartha kale indiyawe ‘da hindu’ puwathpathayi.

kese namuth muralidaran shri lankawata aadaraya karana "shreshta shri lanka puthrayek" bawa pawasana kumar sangakkara, thaman kamathi oonama pudgalayaku puhunu kirimata ohuta ayithiyak thibena bawa awadharanaya karayi.
